column4: Hi all, I'm having a bit of trouble with the desktop cube effect.  When I do ctrl-alt-rightArrow, it spins 2 desktops (skipping one).  It looks like of like a "slide" effect is getting triggered or something.  Any ideas?
i got rid of that by removing the panel applet
i have no idea then, i had the same problem a while ago, it just disspaeard after config messing
